mapper.sql: id, createdAt, updatedAt, isEnable, stockId, stockTypeId, inTransitInCount, inTransitOutCount, sumPurchaseCount, sumPlanConsumeCount, sumRealConsumeCount, orderAvgCostDay, dayAvgCountCost, holdingCostRatio

stock_log.id AS id, stock_log.createdAt AS createdAt, stock_log.updatedAt AS updatedAt, stock_log.isEnable AS isEnable, stock_log.stockId AS stockId, stock_log.stockTypeId AS stockTypeId, stock_log.inTransitInCount AS inTransitInCount, stock_log.inTransitOutCount AS inTransitOutCount, stock_log.sumPurchaseCount AS sumPurchaseCount, stock_log.sumPlanConsumeCount AS sumPlanConsumeCount, stock_log.sumRealConsumeCount AS sumRealConsumeCount, stock_log.orderAvgCostDay AS orderAvgCostDay, stock_log.dayAvgCountCost AS dayAvgCountCost, stock_log.holdingCostRatio AS holdingCostRatio
mapper.update:
UPDATE stock_log
createdAt = #{createdAt},
updatedAt = #{updatedAt},
isEnable = #{isEnable},
stockId = #{stockId},
stockTypeId = #{stockTypeId},
inTransitInCount = #{inTransitInCount},
inTransitOutCount = #{inTransitOutCount},
sumPurchaseCount = #{sumPurchaseCount},
sumPlanConsumeCount = #{sumPlanConsumeCount},
sumRealConsumeCount = #{sumRealConsumeCount},
orderAvgCostDay = #{orderAvgCostDay},
dayAvgCountCost = #{dayAvgCountCost},
holdingCostRatio = #{holdingCostRatio},
WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE stock_log SET isEnable = TRUE WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE stock_log SET isEnable = FALSE WHERE id = #{id}
